rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No spreading of fake news or misinformation
You must be at least 18 years old to use this site.
English posts only please. Techtoots is an English based Mastodon community and as such our expectation is that your posts are also in English.

records.text: I feel enough time had passed to tell this story now. So my last day at the previous job was marked by a group visit to the pub for lunch.Except I found out after we got there, no one was planning to eat at the pub, we'd just have 1 beer.And most people from my team didn't actually come.A couple of people left early.And the beer was off.It was certainly typically for that job.
